info.title: BaaS - Invest
info.description:
API responsible for investment operations.
Investment Status:
  | Status | Description | Notification Event Type |
  |--------| ----------- | ----------------------- |
  | `CREATED` | Successfully created | investment_created |
  | `CONFIRMING` | Sent for internal confirmation | |
  | `CONFIRMED` | Confirmed by client | investment_confirmed |
  | `NOT_CONFIRMED` | Not confirmed by client | investment_not_confirmed |
  | `PROCESSING` | Sent for internal processing | |
  | `PROCESSED` | Successfully processed | |
  | `REJECTED` | Investment has been rejected (final) | investment_rejected |
  | `REJECTED` | Investment has been rejected by account conflict when already exists investment account (final) | investment_account_conflict |
  | `ERROR` | Some error has occurred (final) | investment_error |
  | `DONE` | Investment has been successfully completed (final) | investment_done |


# Status Change Notification
As described in the status table, some statuses will fire a notification call to the owner of the investment. To receive this notifications, its necessary to request the registration of the service URL which will receive the notification object. This object will be sent as an HTTP call with the POST method, of which the client must respond with a 200 status and within 5 seconds.
Notification Call Scheme
Headers:
  ```json
  {
    X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier
    X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Investment Unique Identifier
    X-R4-Event: {event_type} // Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Investment Status Table)
    User-Agent: R4-Hookshot
  }
  ```

Body:
  ```json
  {
    "object_kind": "{event_type}", //Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Notification Status Table)
    "object_id": "GUID", // Investment Unique Identifier
    "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier
    "account_id": "GUID" // Account Unique Identifier
  }
  ```

# Investment Confirmation
To receive the confirmation, its necessary the previous registration of the client url. This object will be sent as an HTTP call with the POST method, of which the client must respond with a 202 status and within 10 seconds.
Investment Confirmation Call Scheme
Headers:
  ```json
  {
    X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier
    X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Attempt Unique Identifier
    X-R4-Event: investment_confirmation // Event Type for the Notification
    User-Agent: R4-Hookshot
  }
  ```

Body:
  ```json
  {
    "object_kind": "investment_confirmation", // Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Investment Status Table)
    "object_id": "GUID", // Investment Unique Identifier
    "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier
    "account_id": "GUID", // Account Unique Identifier
    "metadata": { // Investment data
      "id": "GUID",
      "product_id": "GUID",
      "kind": "string",
      "term": number,
      "maturity_date": string,
      "value": number,
      "repurchase_grace_period": number,
      "calculation_criteria": "string",
      "criteria_type": "string",
      "paper_type": "string",
      "income_type": "string",
      "tax_rate_sequence_number": number,
      "automatic_application_available": boolean,
      "escalated": boolean,
      "automatic_redemption": boolean,
      "redemption_form_identifier": "string",
      "scheduling_available": boolean,
      "application_note": "string"
    }
  }
  ```

# Errors
This service uses [HTTP response status codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HTTP_status_codes) to indicate the success or failure of your API requests.
In general, there are three status code ranges you can expect:
- `2xx` success status codes confirm that your request worked as expected
- `4xx` error status codes indicate an error because of the information provided (e.g., a required parameter was not provided)
- `5xx` error status codes are rare and indicate an error with servers
## HTTP Status code summary
Extracted from [Stripe API codes](https://stripe.com/docs/api/errors)

  - `200 - OK` Everything worked as expected.

  - `400 - Bad Request` The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

  - `401 - Unauthorized` No valid API key provided.

  - `403 - Forbidden` The API key doesn't have permissions to perform the request.

  - `404 - Not Found` The requested resource doesn't exist.

  - `408 - Request Timeout` The connection was ended by timeout.

  - `429 - Too Many Requests` Too many requests hit the API too quickly. We recommend an exponential backoff of your requests.

  - `500, 502, 503, 504 - Server Errors` Something went wrong on R4's end.

## Error codes
Below is a list of possible error codes that can be returned:

  | Code                                | Description                                                                |
  |-------------------------------------| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
  | `ENTITY_ALREADY_EXISTS`             | The operation informed already exists                                      |
  | `INVALID_PARAM`                     | There is an invalid param in the request                                   |
  | `UNEXPECTED_ERROR`                  | Internal server failure                                                    |
  | `ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND`                 | Account was not found.                                                     |
  | `MINIMUM_VALUE_TO_INVEST`           | The value is less then the minimum value to invest.                        |
  | `INVESTMENT_NOT_FOUND`              | Investment was not found.                                                  |
  | `INVALID_INVESTMENT_STATUS`         | The informed investment has an invalid status.                             |
  | `FAILED_TO_CALCULATE_INVESTMENT`    | Failure to calculate investment redemption.                                |
  | `AUTHENTICATION_FAILED`             | Authentication failed.                                                     |
  | `SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE`               | Service is not currently available                                         |
  | `TIMEOUT_EXCEEDED`                  | The connection was ended by timeout                                        |
  | `FAILED_TO_REDEEM_INVESTMENT`       | Failed to redeem investment                                                |
  | `INVESTMENT_CALCULATION_EXPIRED`    | Investment calculation expired, the calculation is not from the same date  |
  | `INVESTMENT_CALCULATION_NOT_FOUND`  | Investment calculation was not found                                       |
